channel.title: Posts on Crayblog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Crayblog

item.title: Adventures with the Thinkpad T440p, dGPU and Coreboot in "Mid 2022"
item.description: This is my documentation about the process of flashing and tweaking coreboot to run properly on my T440p with a dedicated NVIDIA GPU, colloquially known as a ‘dGPU’. There are multiple guides that will teach you how to build, flash, or build and flash coreboot on a T440p without issue. However, if you have a T440p with a dGPU, you will quickly realize that the GPU is mysteriously absent from your PCI device list.

item.title: welcom 2 my websight
item.description: Hey. I’m Cameron. I’m a network admin for a small cellular company in NZ. I like hiking, music production, video games and the free and open-source software movements. I like other stuff, but I forgot tbh. I’ll tell you later if I remember. This is a blog I felt compelled to create as I dive further into open-source. I keep a lot of scattered notes on my own setups that benefit me when I need them.
